analysis.description:
Bounty0xEscrow.approveToPullOutTokens (/unique_chucks/7/0xaf5a7813c6433855e3d4da427c6ad392130f089d.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-ERC20(_token).approve(_receiver,_amount) (/unique_chucks/7/0xaf5a7813c6433855e3d4da427c6ad392130f089d.sol)

Bounty0xEscrow.distributeTokenToAddressesAndAmounts has external calls inside a loop:
	- require(bool)(ERC20(_token).transfer(_hunters[i],_amounts[i])) (/unique_chucks/7/0xaf5a7813c6433855e3d4da427c6ad392130f089d.sol#258-259)

Bounty0xEscrow.distributeTokenToAddressesAndAmountsWithoutHost has external calls inside a loop:
	- require(bool)(ERC20(_token).transfer(_hunters[i],_amounts[i])) (/unique_chucks/7/0xaf5a7813c6433855e3d4da427c6ad392130f089d.sol#275-276)

Bounty0xEscrow.distributeWithTransferFrom has external calls inside a loop:
	- require(bool)(ERC20(_token).transferFrom(_ownerOfTokens,_hunters[i],_amounts[i])) (/unique_chucks/7/0xaf5a7813c6433855e3d4da427c6ad392130f089d.sol#293-294)

Reentrancy in Bounty0xEscrow.depositToken (/unique_chucks/7/0xaf5a7813c6433855e3d4da427c6ad392130f089d.sol#219-231):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(ERC20(_token).transferFrom(msg.sender,this,_amount)) (/unique_chucks/7/0xaf5a7813c6433855e3d4da427c6ad392130f089d.sol#224-228)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokens (/unique_chucks/7/0xaf5a7813c6433855e3d4da427c6ad392130f089d.sol#228-229)
ERC20Basic.totalSupply (/unique_chucks/7/0xaf5a7813c6433855e3d4da427c6ad392130f089d.sol#10-11) should be declared external
